Activities.name: Quick Meditation
Activities.description: A short meditation session to focus on your breath and center your mind.

Activities.name: Deep Breathing Exercise
Activities.description: A short deep breathing exercise. Breathe in through your nose and feel your belly expand. Breathe out through your mouth for a few seconds. Repeat.

Activities.name: Gratitude Exercise
Activities.description: A short writing exercise to reflect on three things you're grateful for today.

Activities.name: Drink Tea
Activities.description: A short sensory experience to savor a warm cup of herbal tea.

Activities.name: Stretching
Activities.description: Perform some gentle indoor stretching exercises for relaxation.

Activities.name: Journaling
Activities.description: Journal your thoughts or goals to clear your mind.

Activities.name: Listen to Relaxing Music
Activities.description: Listen to calming music or nature sounds.

Activities.name: Dance
Activities.description: Dance to your favorite songs to lift your spirits.

Activities.name: Walking
Activities.description: Take an outdoor walk in the neighborhood or park to refresh yourself.

Activities.name: Listen to a Podcast
Activities.description: Half an hour of inspiration through a motivational podcast or talk.

Activities.name: Explore a New Hobby
Activities.description: Try something new, indoors or outdoors, as a creative escape.

Activities.name: Try a New Recipe or Bake
Activities.description: A culinary activity to experiment with a new recipe.

Activities.name: Home Workout
Activities.description: A moderately long workout session at home to boost your energy.

Activities.name: Go Biking
Activities.description: A moderately long bike ride outdoors for a change of pace.

Activities.name: Read Your Favorite Book
Activities.description: Quiet reading time to enjoy a book you want to read.

Activities.name: Take a Long Walk
Activities.description: An hour-long walk in nature to unwind and be present.

Activities.name: Exercise
Activities.description: An hour-long gym session or outdoor workout for a full-body refresh. You can do any workout you prefer - weights, running, swimming, biking, to name a few.

Activities.name: Attend a Yoga Class
Activities.description: Take an instructor-led yoga class, in-person or online, to stretch and de-stress.
